revision.text: Possibly: The history of the rise, progress, and establishment of the independence of the United States of America : including an account of the late war : and of the thirteen colonies, from their origin to that period..., by William Gordon. (London : Printed for the Author, and sold by Charles Dilly ... and James Buckland ..., 1788). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/915487009
